NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.label: Other Real Estate and Foreclosed Assets
OtherRealEstateAndForeclosedAssets.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfHeldToMaturitySecuriti.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities that had been designated as held-to-maturity. Excludes proceeds from maturities, prepayments and calls by the issuer.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff, after Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.label: Financing Receivable, Originated, More than Five Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFiveOrMoreY.description: Amount of financing receivable originated more than five years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.label: Financing Receivable, Year Five, Originated, Four Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedFourYearsBe.description: Amount of financing receivable originated four years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.label: Financing Receivable, Year One, Originated, Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInCurrentFi.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.label: Financing Receivable, Year Two, Originated, Fiscal Year before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedInFiscalYea.description: Amount of financing receivable originated in fiscal year prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.label: Financing Receivable, Year Four, Originated, Three Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedThreeYearsB.description: Amount of financing receivable originated three years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.label: Financing Receivable, Year Three, Originated, Two Years before Current Fiscal Year
FinancingReceivableOriginatedTwoYearsBef.description: Amount of financing receivable originated two years prior to current fiscal year.

FinancingReceivableRevolving.label: Financing Receivable, Revolving
FinancingReceivableRevolving.description: Amount of financing receivable that can be withdrawn, repaid and redrawn.

TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Remainder of Fiscal Year
TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceFor.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAllowanceFor.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityCreditLossEx.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityCreditLossEx.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, Less than 12 Months, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleContinuous.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in continuous unrealized loss position for less than 12 months, without an allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position, Number of Positions
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Number of investments in debt securities measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position, without allowance for credit loss. Includes beneficial interest in securitized financial asset.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

Investments.label: Investments
Investments.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all investments.

ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Proceeds from Life Insurance Policy
ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Additions
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesAd.description: Reflects the amount of new advances made to related parties in the form of loan and lease receivables.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties, Proceeds
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedPartiesPr.description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.
